alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:33AM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River at Riverside affecting Walker, Polk, San Jacinto and Trinity Counties. For the Trinity River...including Crockett, Riverside, Romayor, Goodrich, Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Riverside. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 135.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding continues as significant backwater up Thomas Lake floods the lowest areas in the Green Rich Shore Subdivision in Walker County with the boat ramp completely inundated. The lowest lying areas in the Deep River Plantation Subdivision and FM 980 northwest of Riverside are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 135.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 133.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CST Wednesday was 135.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 135.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 133.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 135.1 feet on 10/30/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Trinity River Riverside 133.5 135.2 Wed 8 am CST 135.2 135.2 134.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM CST.
